title: Dthorne1
author: Dthorne1
content: Hello. I’m looking for help from you guys on the best website or pay for service that gives you information on ICO / Presale of new tokens preferably on the Binance chain.  I look on coin gecko at the new coins listed and see that after a day or so some coins are already 2-300% up. I’d like to be able to find info so that I could get a chance to buy these prior to being listed so I could have a chance to actually buy a coin before it’s all time high. I’m only looking to throw a couple hundred into a few coins and see if I can hit on one. Thanks!

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: i actually made a telegram channel its pretty new but in a week or a month i update about ICO/ IDo calendar you can check it out here https://t.me/offeringcalendar but you also check it on the web try search "ico calendar"and yes one of the benefits buy from ico is gaining x2 or more, there is coin that x300 from the ico price. but you can gain more if you participate in community based venture capital

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Use icodrops as one of your reference. They are usually introducing a new project from time to time but not sure whether they are on bsc chain. Sometime it is on other chains too. But if you want bsc network then wait for binance launchpad projects cause they are launching normally on bsc network as its partner with binance. But depends sometime the project is available too on other chains. Can I ask why you preferably on bsc? Is it because of the gas fee?

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Dthorne1 on September 21, 2022, 11:51:32 PMHello. I’m looking for help from you guys on the best website or pay for service that gives you information on ICO / Presale of new tokens preferably on the Binance chain.  I look on coin gecko at the new coins listed and see that after a day or so some coins are already 2-300% up. I’d like to be able to find info so that I could get a chance to buy these prior to being listed so I could have a chance to actually buy a coin before it’s all time high. I’m only looking to throw a couple hundred into a few coins and see if I can hit on one. Thanks!To get information related to token sales, you will actually get it if you join various sales platforms, for example such as DAOMaker, Polkastarter, BSCPad, Seedify and many others.For DAOMaker, Polkastarter and Seedify themselves, they not only support tokens from only 1 chain but from various chains such as Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Avalanche and others.That way, you will be given more options to invest.But for the Pre-sale, I don't dare to suggest anything, because there are so many projects that end in the failure of independent sales. Instead of having to suffer losses later, it's better for you to buy these new tokens from a trusted platform.

comments.author: merekamo
comments.body: Presale token has multiple benefits for investors and project developers. Presale stage is good for a company's ICO. It helps to collect some funds and gives the ability to offer a lower price per token.In my opinion, it doesn't mean we buy tokens during presale will get 100%-200% profit.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on September 22, 2022, 03:53:28 AM...and yes one of the benefits buy from ico is gaining x2 or more, there is coin that x300 from the ico price. but you can gain more if you participate in community based venture capital Not everything is as simple as you write about it. As a rule, coins purchased at the preliminary stage and as part of a public sale have a lock. Accordingly, by the time of TGE, you will be able to sell 10-15%, and the remaining coins will be unlocked in equal parts throughout the year. Accordingly, if you do not return the amount of your investment from the first distribution, then the price of the next unlock may be significantly lower than the one at which you bought.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on September 22, 2022, 03:53:28 AMyes one of the benefits buy from ico is gaining x2 or more, there is coin that x300 from the ico price. but you can gain more if you participate in community based venture capital Thats true but 300x or any other multiplier could happened on negative side too. Some of the projects that I invested too in some private sales has been down for like its gone already, so better to check out and be very careful. Ico projects are way good than simple degen but we need to find which one is really an interesting project among the list.Usually like tvplus006 said, weve only benefited on the initial unlock but the rest, thats where thr struggle begins especially if the project isnt focusing on things to do and improve on their platform.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: In this bear market most newly launched project may not give good profit as it should during the bull market, it is very important to understand this and also know the project you want to invest. Only few out of many can be worthy of investment during this period. However, if the project have the potential to be successful long-term investing now will not be a bad thing. Icodrops is another good place to check all upcoming projects from all networks.

comments.author: Uang_kartal
comments.body: you can look for references here  you are tempted in the bsc network, with the same according to some people's interests. maybe it will be of interest, yes. you can also search on twitter search with #ico / #ido and so on. if you have loose funds, try not to just analyze 1 token, meaning that if there are 10 tokens, there could be a 10% profit opportunity [lowest] maybe multiples of 4. cannot be measured by ROI with the same success. keep using your awareness in investing without being influenced by fomo

comments.author: Polo crypto
comments.body: Hi you can search on altFINS twitter news feed by searching pre-sale: https://altfins.com/news

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: I can only tell you these sites. In my opinion these sites are the most reliable ico sites for you. There are so many legit icos already listed in these sites. I know CEO as well. https://icodrops.com/Cryptorank.ioThese sites are legit sites and you can try to find so many new icos that will be launched very soon. The only problem is there will be no guarantee if you can make so much money from investing in the new icos. this actually depends on the performance from the ico itself.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Dthorne1 on September 21, 2022, 11:51:32 PM...I’d like to be able to find info so that I could get a chance to buy these prior to being listed so I could have a chance to actually buy a coin before it’s all time high. ..Do not forget that investing in coins at an early stage requires knowledge that will allow you to choose the right coin for investment. If you do not have such knowledge, then even if you manage to avoid scam, the coin may turn out to be one that has no value and support from the community, as a result of which you will lose your money.

comments.author: Ihugbogo
comments.body: Quote from: Dthorne1 on September 21, 2022, 11:51:32 PMHello. I’m looking for help from you guys on the best website or pay for service that gives you information on ICO / Presale of new tokens preferably on the Binance chain. check out list of ICO,IDO, IEO below since they are free you can equally subscribe your email with them, 1. CryptoTotem2. CRYPTORANK3. Crypto.com4.  CryptoNews5.  Icoholders6. Coindesk7.  ICOHIGHYou can choose the bsc project since that's where your major concern is.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: There are very few ico projects which success in raising fund successfully and most of them failed . This J's bear market and now big investor is looking for new projects and when token list everybody is looking to sell tokens which results dump at start of listing. I will recommend to not take part in these Tokens in this situation.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: You can also check these sites for the upcoming ICO and presale listings.https://www.icolistingonline.com/upcoming-ico/https://icomarks.com/icos?status=upcominghttps://topicolist.com/It is indeed an advantage to invest in a project on its pre-sale stage.  Although there is more risk in investing in this stage, the outcome can be unimaginable if we manage to invest on the right project.  I had witnessed lots of investors gaining hundred to thousand of times profit from investing in a pre-sale, but also witnessed investors losing investment if they happen to fall prey on scam projects.  So it is always best to do thorough research before investing in any of the projects in a pre-sale stage.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Joining airdrop groups or icodrop groups in telegram. There you can find different ICO and other related information that you are looking for. You should also join bounty groups as some people there could share other group that is the same as the bounty group that you have join and could find other ICOs though it is not 100% sure that it isn't a scam ICO. ICO nowadays are mostly scam and you can only find few legit or seldom to find legit ICO which it is like that for few years already.

comments.author: dunfida
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on September 22, 2022, 04:06:57 AMUse icodrops as one of your reference. They are usually introducing a new project from time to time but not sure whether they are on bsc chain. Sometime it is on other chains too. But if you want bsc network then wait for binance launchpad projects cause they are launching normally on bsc network as its partner with binance. But depends sometime the project is available too on other chains. Can I ask why you preferably on bsc? Is it because of the gas fee? When it comes on choosing up BSC and looking into those newly launched projects you could eventually see that its price soars up plus it is really tagged along with the most popular exchange platform which it would really be that understandable that people would really be aiming on dealing on something which is really connected or related into this platform or simply they had able to see those growths or gainson why they've decided for it to be on BSC chain and just like the rest that had been saying that investing on presale doesnt always end up on a good result.Due to lots of project then risk is much higher when you do really deal up on the wrong project which would cause losses.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Dthorne1 on September 21, 2022, 11:51:32 PMHello. I’m looking for help from you guys on the best website or pay for service that gives you information on ICO / Presale of new tokens preferably on the Binance chain.  I look on coin gecko at the new coins listed and see that after a day or so some coins are already 2-300% up. I’d like to be able to find info so that I could get a chance to buy these prior to being listed so I could have a chance to actually buy a coin before it’s all time high. I’m only looking to throw a couple hundred into a few coins and see if I can hit on one. Thanks!As others in this thread have already said, there are a few different Telegram groups or websites where you can find lists, dates and information about upcoming crypto projects. That being said, don't really expect to find neutral information there. You always need to be aware that the crypto space is full of shillers that are just hyping up the token that they have invested in themself. Especially telegram groups are very bad in that regard. I doubt that there are telegram groups out there that are giving good and neutral evaluations of upcoming crypto projects without a bias. If those groups exist i am pretty sure that you have to pay to get into those.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: IMO cryptorank is the most reliable one for you. You can search the upcoming bsc project easily rather than using another site. There was a feature that let you to filter only projects that will be launched through BSC will appear in the result of your search. Im always using this tool to know which reliable project that will be launched and what kind of blockchain that will be used by such project. It can be used easily without any doubt.
